column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////People always ask me where to go for Chicago deep dish pizza
column2: and I always recommend Lou Malnatis.  If you're vegetarian
column5: definitely try the pepperoni (which can be on the spicy side) or order sausage.  There is 2 ways to order sausage at Lou Malnatis
column6: so make sure you know what you are getting into.  If you order sausage
column7: it will come as a giant sheet of sausage as an entire layer of the pizza.  If you tell them easy sausage
column8: it will come in the more traditional way of having pieces of sausage sprinkled on top of the pie.  You can't go wrong with either
column9: just a matter of personal preference.  Either way
column10: this is my hands down favorite place to go for authentic Chicago Deep Dish pizza.
